title: How to get free access to Chegg - Quora

response.answer_text: Chegg has changed the world of education. As Chegg provides online resources of educational materials. Yet, there are many who want to enjoy the benefits of Chegg for free. Without having to worry about paying a subscription. Many wants to get a Free Chegg Account. Also students can use popular services like Chegg: Paperhelp and ExpertCollegeWriting. The administrator at Chegg says they are all about removing the obstacles that stand in the way of the education you want and deserve. They do this by providing many education resources. They provide textbook renting, study help, course reviews, scholarship catalogs, among many more.  This platform is all about how they can help students save time and money while becoming smarter. It describes itself as “one big education-redefining student hub.” Chegg began seventeen years ago in 2001. Created by three Iowa State University students. It started off as Cheggpost and was a site where students could post about sports materials, books or furniture. The founders noticed that a majority of the exchange among students were textbooks. This gave birth to the idea for which Chegg is today known for. By 2007, the company disable all its services not related to renting and purchasing of textbooks. It rebranded itself as Chegg, a resource for educational materials. Benefits of Having a Chegg Account · Cheap Textbooks and eTextbooks for purchase at very affordable rates · Students can rent textbooks · Online tutoring services to aid better subject understanding (also you can use Paperhelp and ExpertCollegeWriting) · Offer question and answer services · Has an expert community · Supports students with writing (Paperhelp) · Provides services to prevent and identify plagiarism in writing (also you can use Paperhelp and ExpertCollegeWriting) · Available for use on iOS and Android Pricing and Subscription for a Chegg Login Service and Product Pricing Chegg Study 16.95 USD/month Chegg Math Solver 9.95 USD/month Chegg Writing 9.95 USD/month Chegg Tutors 75 cent/ tutoring minute 48 USD/ week for 120 tutoring minutes 30 USD/ month for 60 tutoring minutes 96 USD/ month for 240 tutoring minutes Chegg offers about 7 days of free trials before users then get to pay for a premium subscription plan. Consider using Free Chegg Alternatives Although Chegg is well known as a great source of online educational resources, materials and solutions, there are other alternatives. If you are unable to afford or are unwilling to pay for the Chegg premium subscription plan to enjoy its benefits, then you should consider a free alternative. We have put together some free Chegg alternatives like Paperhelp and ExpertCollegeWriting that provides similar solution. And for free, you would not have to worry about hacking the system or getting a free account. Thanks. Uncollapse my answer please.

You can get free access for chegg by creating a new account using your e-mail ID and password. But you can use it for a limited time period only! After the date of free subscription is over, they’ll ask you to pay which is quite a lot if you ask. You can look for other alternative apps or websites. I can suggest one such app called “ConectsQ&A”. It is a wonderful problem solving app. You can get the answer to your questions just within a few seconds and the answers are given by experienced tutors! You must give it a try. You won’t regret.

Chegg is basically an online study platform for only American students. But the Subject Matter Experts are spread across many countries. American students must be subscribed to Chegg for gaining access to answers. I guess if you are looking to gain access to answers/tutorials on Chegg, you need to be residing in the USA. America is Chegg s only market. However, you can help solve questions on Chegg by becoming a Subject Matter Expert in your area of expertise and that way you can become part of Chegg in a more productive manner. Thanks

From Google search: To get Chegg free trial, just visit their official website and register using your email id and password to create an account with them. That's it. Once a registered user, you can start using the website and most of its features. Note that you can cancel your free trial any time before its expiry.
